name: [Concept] on/off
description:
Easy way to undress your girl.

Issues:

  1. white lines at left and right side of image, or top and down

  2. mirroring

  3. bad working with horizontal split

  4. hard to set pose

Works better with: merongmix

Put the trigger <ConceptOnOff_v10>
You need to use a weight from 0.55 to 0.7

Just add your prompt like this: girl, short pink hair, standing, left dressed right naked. I highly recommend using the "merongmix+" model

meta.prompt: ultra detailed, emerald pink hair, short hair, beauty  face, masterpiece, best quality, 8k, high quality, slim body,original face,facial ,beautiful, masterpiece, best quality, extremely detailed face, perfect lighting, ((maid)), ((bent over)), (white background:1.8), split <lora:on_off-000012:0.55>
